pkgmetadata.longdescription: Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) of chromosome 22 401st to 500th exon from the 1000 Genomes (1KG) Project by the Washington University Genome Sequencing Center (WUGSC). // The assembled .bam files of whole exome sequencing data from the 1000 Genomes Project. 46 samples sequenced by the Washington University Genome Sequencing Center are included.
